DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of intravenous magnesium on postoperative throat pain after thyroidectomy. The secondary purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of intravenous magnesium on total dose of fentanyl in recovery room after thyroidectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Intravenous Magnesium on Postoperative Sore Throat After Thyroidectomy
